1.content: Which on of these secret agents will be tickled?
1.title: Getting Started

11.content:
Agent South, the angry bitter blonde of Project Freelancer, I think she needs a smile on her ever scowling face, but how does she get tickled?

Does one of the Freelancers get sick of her attitude and take matters into their own tickling hands?

Does her brother, North, want to make his sister feel better after a failed mission?

Does a sparring match with Tex turn into a one-sided tickle fight as the others watch?

Does she get captured during a mission and tickle tortured for information?

Or does anyone else have their own idea?
11.title: South

112.content:
"Damnit!"
          A pink and green helmet sailed across the room and hit the wall with a crash, leaving an ominous dent in the gray metal. It clattered to the ground noisily, but South paid no attention to it, instead opting to slam an armored fist against her military standard bed, which groaned under the assault. She let out a growl and stepped away before she could destroy it in anger, her pinkish-blond hair dancing around her face. Not that she would have minded if she did. She certainly felt like destroying something right now.
          She had been Number 4 on the leaderboard. Number 4! She had been ranked better than her brother, better than Maine, even better than that psycho Florida. God damn her if she wasn't just a little creeped out by the blue bastard. She could never tell what was up with him. One moment he was acting like freakin' Santa Claus, all kind words and cheerful smiles, the next, he was hacking people apart with a bone saw for information. Sometimes it was both at the same time. It was like he got his jollies off torture and murder or something. She was pretty sure he operated directly under the Director, if the frequent visits to his office we're anything to go by.
          She felt her lips curl into a snarl. The Director. Jackass. Like he knew the shit they had to go through just to get out of there alive, let alone with his stupid information.
          Your carelessness revealed our intentions, and made our next mission more difficult. His words bounced around in her brain, replaying again and again and again, until they sounded almost mocking. She growled and began to tear off her armor piece by piece, throwing it into a messy pile in the corner of her room. How the hell was it her fault some moron had decided to wander in with their coffee? It's not like she could look through walls or see into the future or some shit!
         While it's loading, set your god damn trackers. Her fingers stilled on the clasp of her breastplate as she heard North's voice echo in her ears. Then in one violent motion, she tore it off and flung it into the growing armor pile, where it sent several more pieces spilling to the ground, leaving her clad in only her bodysuit. She stepped over to her dresser and pulled out a clean set of clothes before sliding out of her bodysuit and beginning to slip on the new clothes.
         She... she could handle this. She wasn't going to just sulk. Sulking wouldn't solve anything. She was still in the top 5, she just had to do well on the next mission, and she'd be back where she belonged. Hell, she'd do so well, they'd kick Wyoming off his British ass- sorry bum- and give her the third place spot. And then she'd knock the two lovebirds off their thrones and take the top as Number 1. Maybe that would keep Carolina from being so insufferably smug all the time.
          Now if only she could make herself believe it.
          A knock came at the door, and South scowled as she pulled a faded purple T-shirt over head. Great. Already, the peanut gallery was coming to sweet talk her about how lozing her place "wasn't a big deal". Or they were coming to laugh at her, in which case, they could kiss their lives goodbye. She could only hope it wasn't Wash. She really didn't want to deal with his naive encouragement right now. "Go the fuck away," she called.
          "No thanks, but I appreciate the offer." She bit back a groan. She really didn't want to have to deal with him right now. Or at all, if possible. She wasn't in the mood to be patronized over losing her spot. "You have all your clothes on in there?"
          "Go to hell, North."
          "I'll take that as a yes. Now how bout' you let me in?" Though she couldn't see him behind powerful steel door, she could picture the look of amusement his face. South resisted the urge to open the door just to punch him in the face.
         "How about I don't and you fuck off," she said. Hopefully that would send him the hint that she didn't want to be bothered.
          "I will camp out in front of your door." She bit back a particularly nasty swear word that she felt described the idiot perfectly. She didn't doubt him either. The others would complain, but they wouldn't be surprised.
         After someone does something five times, no matter how unusual, you tend to get used to it.
         "Fine, I'll open the fucking door," she snapped. She stormed over to the control panel, and though she was careful not to break this one, made sure to slam a fist against it extra hard so her twin would know exactly how angry she was about this. Yeah, it was kind of childish, did she give a fuck? Nope. North was practically threatening her with harassment; she could be as childish as she fucking wanted.
          She was pretty sure what he would do if she didn't open the door was harassment. Practically borderline stalking in fact, if he was going to be camped outside her door like he was having a fucking stakeout.
         North strolled in, helmet dangling in one hand and eyes a slightly disgusting mixture of concern, humor, and and kindness even as he surveyed the messy room. He was still dressed in his purple battle armor, green highlights clearly visible against the dark paint. His sandy blond hair glinted under the dim ceiling light, and his mouth remained curved upwards in a small gentle smile.
          "Nice room," he quipped cheerily.
          Yup, she was definitely feeling the urge to give one to him straight to the nose. Experience had taught her that getting violent wasn't a way to convince North to leave you alone though, so it would be pointless if she did. If she could just stay calm and answer her his questions, then maybe he would get the fuck out of her room. "What the fuck do you want North?"
          "To talk." She almost snorted. Off all the lines he chose to open up with, that's the one he chose?
         "Okay then, let's talk. I just lost my spot to you because that old sack of shit thinks I didn't preform up to standards or whatever. It was good talking with you. Now get out of my room."
          He placed a hand on her shoulder. "South, he didn't-" She never got to hear what it was the Director didn't do, because the quiet compassion in his voice was what made her finally erupt. She spun around and knocked his hand off her, ignoring the way his eyes widened with shock.
          "No! Don't tell me 'he didn't mean it badly' or 'he didn't want to hurt me' or any of that, because that bastard doesn't give a shit about any of us! He's always locked up in his lab with those damn techies of his, but has he ever been on a mission? Never! Who the hell gave him the right to judge us on how well we do?!"
          "Well he is the Director of Project Freelancer-"
          "I don't care! What the hell is he even doing in his lab all day?" The only times we see him is for mission briefings, and he contributes so much to those." She glared at her twin for a moment more, before flopping down on her bed and throwing one arm over her face. "This is such bullshit."
          A tense silence filled the air for a few seconds. It was broken briefly by the creak of the bed as North sat down next to her. Then the room was quiet again as neither of the twins said anything. She cast a glance at him and found him frowning at the floor, his brow furrowed as he cast around his thoughts, probably trying to find something to say that would improve her mood. Well, at least she could enjoy the silence while it lasted.
          "Hey, South?" She bit back a groan. She just had to jinx it, didn't she?
          "What do you want?"
          "Do you remember when we were little?"
          This time she really did groan. "I swear to God, if you tell me some story from our childhood, I'm going to kill myself."
          He ignored her less than enthusiastic reaction. "Do you remember when we used to fight a lot?"
          She couldn't really see where he was going with this, but she nodded anyway. "Uh, I guess?"
         "Really?" There was something about his voice that was making her feel a bit uneasy. That and the feeling that she was forgetting something very important. "Then do you remember what I did to you to make you forgive me afterwards?"
          Afterwards? She ran her fingers through her blond hair as she thought back to what seemed like a lifetime ago. That's right, they used to get in a whole lot of fights with each other, and it would always end with neither speaking too the other for a couple of hours. Then North would go and... Her eyes widened and she tried to sit up, but she was unprepared. North, on the other hand, was poised and ready. He threw himself on top of her, and all the breath in her lungs was driven out as the armored man crashed on top of her. By the time she had regained her wits, North had already pinned her down.
          "You son of a bitch," she growled, struggling frantically under him as she tried to throw him off. In a regular fight, she may have been able to, but she was out of her armor and was unable to lift his suits weight without her strength booster. "Don't you dare-"
          "Hey South," he interrupted. "If I remember correctly, you were most ticklish on your...
112.title: When Things Go South...

12.content: Who will do the tickling?
12.title: Carolina

121.content:
On Carolina's last mission she had failed to complete either of the objectives. She was called to The Director's meeting room several hours after the mission.
"Well Agent Carolina, I don't even know WHERE to begin. You let a full suit of armor fall to the enemy and you let the leader of the resistance get away AGAIN! I am VERY disappointed in you for these failures. You will receive a punishment to fit. You will go to room 572b tomorrow at exactly 0700 hours." said The Director. "Yes, sir." Carolina replied.
121.title: York

1211.content: Carolina woke up at 0500 hours as usual. She put on her black skintight jumpsuit. She went down to the mess hall and ate breakfast. By the time she finished it was almost 0700 hours.
1211.title: The next morning

12111.content: Carolina hurried down the hall. She got to the room at exactly 0700 hours. She entered the room and saw the director. He was standing next to a treadmill. "You're punishment, agent Carolina, is to run for 24 hours straight, no stop!" he said. "Yes, sir." she said. The Director left the room as she started. He came in every 20 minutes to check. By the second check-in Carolina was red-faced and sweaty.
12111.title: Room 572b

121111.content: She was dismissed and went back to her quarters. York was fast asleep in a folding chair next to her bed. "York, YORK." she said shaking him awake. "Wha-what?" he said jerking awake. "You fell asleep in a chair next to my bed. What's up?" she said. "I was worried about you" he said. "You had not been seen in 24 hours. I figured something bad happened to you. So I decided to wait here for you to get back." Carolina sat down on her bed and groaned. "What's the matter with you?" he said. "You look like you're in pain." Carolina took off her boots and moaned. "Only my feet." she said. "The director made me run for 24 hours straight with out breaks... Can I ask you a favor?." "Sure." said York. "Could you..."
121111.title: After the punishment.

1211111.content: "Sure" he says. "I'd be happy to." he takes off her socks and takes her right foot. He starts rubbing his thumbs along the arch of her foot. He then does circular movements on the heel and balls of her foot. He repeats this process with the other foot. He then places both of her feet in his lap. He puts his fingers between her toes and starts slowly but firmly rubbing. She quickly draws her feet away and squeals. "What the hell was that about?" asks York. "Sorry." says Carolina. " I'm extremely ticklish!" "You are?" he said. " I'm surprised that someone of you're... stature ... to be ticklish. " "Don't get any funny ideas York." she warns him." just because we're dating dose not mean I won't destroy you!" she kids. York finishes the massage and Carolina thanks him. They both have nothing scheduled for the next day so they go to the rec room to watch some TV.
1211111.title: Rub my feet

12111111.content: Carolina is flipping through the channels while York is reading a magazine. "I am SSSOOOOOO bored." said Carolina. "I think I know how to liven things up." said York. He tackled Carolina to the couch. Just then someone else came in...
12111111.title: Tickle time!!

choices: It's time for Carolina to laugh her ass off
121111112.content: "Should I come back later" said Wash, seeing York on top of Carolina. "No, actually I need you're help with something." said York. "Uuuuuummmmmm, I don't think I can be much help with-" " Dude you are a fucking pervert. That's not what I'm doing!" said York. " I need you to get me some straps from the supply closet." " Alright, alright. Don't get you're jumpsuit in a twist!" said Wash. He left the room and came back five minutes later. He set down the straps and the two of them tightly strapped Carolina's wrists and ankles to the couch. "Alright Carolina said she was bored so we're gonna liven things up. We're gonna tickle the living shit out of her!" said York. "Sounds like a plan to me!" agreed Wash.
121111112.title: Washington

1211111121.content: Wash rolled her shirt up to the bottom of her shirt while York took off her boots and socks. " Guys please, be reasonable!!!" begged Carolina. "We ARE being reasonable. You said you were bored, so we're gonna liven things up!!" said York.
1211111121.title: It's time for Carolina to laugh her ass off

12111111212.content: "Please!" she said. "Don't do it! *gasp*" she draws in breath as York runs his forefinger down the arch of her foot. She burst into laughter as Wash digs his fingers into her sides. At the same time York is tickling her feet with all fingers. " HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! PPPLLLLLLEEEEEEEAAAAAASSSSSEEEE... DON'T ... NNOOOOO... SSSTTAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHPPPP!!!" "Did you just hear her say 'dont stop' or am I hearing things?" said York. "Yup that's what I heard!" agreed Wash.
12111111212.title: Begging for mercy

121111112122.content:
After about an hour of this torture they finally stop. Carolina goes to take a nap and is sure to lock her door.


On her next mission Carolina has a bad day. Her and the leader of the resistance face off. (not to mention his bodyguards). He slams Carolina against the wall and punches her so her helmet falls off and headbutts her. His bodyguards then proceed to fight. They are winning...
121111112122.title: Carolina convinces them to stop.

1211111121221.content: She was sleeping in her bed and York woke her up. "Dinner time." he said "I don't care." she said "I'm not going." "So it was that bad huh?" he asked. "Worse. I hurt my back, face, feet, ankles, and legs." she said wincing as she sat up. "Here, I'll give you a full body massage. Whew! Right after you get out of the shower!" he kidded.
1211111121221.title: After the mission

12111111212211.content:
She stepped out of the shower wrapped in a towel. "Don't bother putting clothes on." said York." I'm gonna need to see where I'm rubbing so I don't make it worse. She took off the towel and layed face down on the bed. "Where do you want me to start?" asked York.

"Well the most pain is in my..." said Carolina.
12111111212211.title: After a quick shower

121111112122111.content: He massages her back rubbing his hands along the length of her back. He then does her feet, arms, and legs.
121111112122111.title: Back

1211111121221111.content: York hears a knock on the door. He answers it. It's North. "I need to talk to Carolina for a sec." said North. "Uh, yeah. She cant exactly talk right now." said York. "Well would you tell her to meet me in the rec room in about an hour. You might want to come in about half an hour." said North. " Okay. I'll be there." said York.
1211111121221111.title: Afterwards

12111111212211111.content: York showed up at the rec room where North was waiting. "Alright." North said. "I was talkin' to Carolina the other day and she told me that nothing could crack her. Well I was talking to a buddy in the prisoner interrogation office and he said that tickling could break anyone. I asked South about it and she said nothing could break her." "Okay. So you want to prove them wrong?" said York. "Yeah." said North. "Im gonna tell you a story from when South and I were little..."
12111111212211111.title: Half hour later

121111112122111111.content:
"You see when South and I were about 13, they didn't trust us enough to
Leave us home alone, so they would get one babysitter and only one. Our 19 year old neighbor, Alexis. When she came over she knew South loved to be tickled. So we would strip south naked and duct tape her to the floor. Her arms over her head and her legs split wide. She would beg and plead for about half an hour, then we would tickle her. If she didn't pass out she would pee. Even after she was clean or concious again we would continue tickling her. We could tickle her for hours at a time. Advice is tickle her underarms, stomach, sides, insides of her thighs, and feet. She will go BALLISTIC with laughter." said North. "This is going to be fucking awsome!" said York.
121111112122111111.title: Flashback

125.content:
After a failed mission the director brings Carolina into his office. "Carolina your incompetence to fully be successful during your mission has left some of our best soldiers in the hands of the enemy!". "I know director it won't happen aging" "I know because of what I have in store for you"

What dose he do
125.title: The Director

1252.content:
The Director motions Carolina over to a room she's never seen before with a metal table clamps and under a large light. "Agent Carolina please lay on the table" said the director in a monotoned voice. "Yes sir" responded Carolina. As soon as she laid down the clamps shut on her ankles and wrists. "Sir?" Asked Carolina. "Right now our agents could be being tortured for information now you'll feel what it is like" replied the Director.

What dose he do
1252.title: Surprise

12522.content:
"Sir?" Carolina asked a little worriedly. "Interrogation is a way of of breaking down a persons mental state, and that is what I plan to do with you Carolina until I know everything about you" said the director. Carolina grew worried there were thing she didn't even want the director to know about her and what will she endure.


Where will the torture happen
12522.title: Interrogates

choices: The director moves to her sides
125221.content:
The director pushed a button and a tiny stream of electricity connected to her boot. At first it did nothing then a few seconds later she felt something inside her boot. It didn't hurt no if felt...tingly then she realized the director's plan tickle torture, the sensation soon grew little by little along the sole of her socked foot, her feet were very sensitive especially in socks. while she tried to show no weakness a smile was forming inside her helmet.

What happens next
125221.title: Lower body

1252212.content:
The electricity slowly spreads along her whole leg. The director noticed it was going to be as slow proses so he simply started the electricity up with the other boot soon both her legs were engulfed in the tingly electricity but that wasn't the worst of it.

What next
1252212.title: Carolina's feet are in trouble

12522121.content: Occasionally light giggles could be heard from Carolina. But then the doors opened "you wanted to see me sir ". "Ahh agent Texas good please interrogate agent Carolina tell you know every thing about her " said the director as he left "don't worry" said Tex as she rested her hand on the toe of Carolina's boot."it would be my pleasure"
12522121.title: Tex comes in

125221211.content:
Tex goes over to the computer and starts typing something. Then stands back suddenly it seemed like the electricity intensified but in reality Tex managed to hack Carolina's AIs making the nerves in her lower body more sensitive."so what secrets do you have Carolina" Tex said in a superior voice."None that concern you" Carolina said as more giggles came out faster than before.

Next
125221211.title: Tex has her fun

1252212111.content:
"Ok" Said tex in an oh well type of voice. As she turned the electricity off Carolina couldn't believe was giving up. But some thing else happened tex grabbed Carolina's right boot and slowly removed it revealing a teal colored compression knee sock. Tex then started to drag her finger from knee to sole on Carolina's socked foot while she took off her boot. "Don't crack Don't crack not to Texas" thought Carolina as her giggles became common.

Next
1252212111.title: Carolina shouldn't have done that

13.content:
Agent Texas had been surprised at his question, but answered yes in a matter of seconds. Agent Maine had caught her off guard, something that didn' happen often. They had now been dating secretly for several months now.
One night they were in Maine's room talking when someone knocked on the door...




Who was it?
13.title: Tex

131.content:
Maine opened the door to find CT there in her zero suit, looking tired. "Hey Maine, I'm sorry to bother you but I just found Carolina and York, If no one does anything soon, York's gonna be a body bag by tomorrow." She spoke hastily and with reason, looking more and more alert as she spoke.
Maine responded with a growl and motioned for CT to lead the way. "I gotta see this." said Tex, startling CT. "Tex? Why are you here?" She asked, confused. Maine growled more urgently and CT led them to the training floor, where they found Carolina chasing York shouting "I'M GONNA KILL YOU!". Maine sighed and went to solve the problem.

"So why exactly were you in Maine's quarters?" CT asked Tex. "None of your damn buisness." replied Tex. "But if you tell ANYONE I'll make it my mission to make your life a living hell." "Well then, don't have to get like that. I was just asking." CT said poking Tex in the side. Tex giggled, CT kept poking at her sides. "Aww, is miss big and tough ticklish?" CT mocked. "No, I'm not." Tex said giggling. "Well how about we tell MAINE?!" CT said. "No, please, don't tell Maine... he'll tickle the shit outta me if he found out..." Tex begged.
"How about if I'm there being tickled by Wash with you?" CT said, smiling. "Fine, but I blame you if anyone but me, you Maine, and Wash finds out about this.!" Tex said.

Maine came out of the training room with an unconcious York, and a satisfied looking Carolina. Maine sighed and growled, which they all translated to "Man, I'm getting sick of knocking York out every other day..."
131.title: CT

132.content:
Still P.O.ed at Tex for well... Every thing Carolina storms in then questions the fact that Tex is sitting in mains room. " why are you in Mains room?" Asked Carolina "Non of you damn business!" Snapped Tex. quickly Carolina puts the pieces together. "Well well well all high and mighty Tex is ticklish." Mocks Carolina. "What no I'm not " snaps Tex accusingly.


What dose Carolina do
132.title: Carolina

1321.content:
"Really?" Says Carolina "everyone has an Achilles heel". She taps Tex's right knee high armor boot mid calf visibly Tex clenches the chair she's sitting in Carolina smiles.


What's next
1321.title: Tap Tex's boot

13212.content:
Carolina motions main to come over here he did. As Tex was about to get up and leave main held her down on the bed. Carolina sat at the foot of the bed and said "just admit you have a weakness" "I'm not a weakling like you"tex spat. "Then you won't mind If I do this" Carolina said as she slowly dragged her finger along the bottom of Tex's right power boot. Tex tried to kick but it was useless Carolina caught the boot and quickly ran her finger along the spots with zero suit visual. Inside Tex's helmet her face is bright red and toes are curling with each passing second a smile starts to form on the corner of her mouth and she lets out a giggle which Carolina clearly heard.

What next
13212.title: Tickle time

choices: One more trick up Carolina and Mains sleeves
132121.content:
"Let's kick this up a notch" Carolina opens a panel on Tex's left boot and re a ranges some wires "wh-what are you doing" Tex asked hesitantly. "This" Carolina said as she just closed the panel on Tex's left boot and as she did the boot started vibrating Tex jerked back it was getting really hard not to show weakness

Next
132121.title: Carolina continues more aggressively

1321211.content: "Oh look at the whittle freelancer trying so hard not to break adorable" Carolina said in a mocking tone "well lucky for me I got one more trick main help with this" "wh-wh-what I-SSS th a-At" "this" Carolina said as she removed Tex's right knee high armor boot to reveal a rainbow colored knee high padded compression sock. "Awwww whittle Texas likes rainbows" Carolina mocked. She then tickled full force on Tex's socked feet and leg. Tex couldn't take any more "please no sTAAAAHHAAA HA H" Tex burst in to laughter Main wanted in on the fun so he was in the proses of removing her vibrating left boot when Texas rolled off the bed and onto the floor Carolina quick grabbed her flaying leg and continued to tickle and main took off the vibrating left boot and started to tickle her left socked foot "YOU WIN IM TICKLISH OK" as Tex said this an Involuntary reaction happened Tex peed her armor and with that ran out and to her room with out being noticed but many nights after all she could feel were main and Carolina's hands on her socked feet.
1321211.title: One more trick up Carolina and Mains sleeves

141.content:
Ever since they met each other on the second day of Project Freelancer they knew they would be best friends. They shared everything together: A room, training sessions, missions, even the same LOVE interests. They both liked only one of the boys: Agent Maine. About two years after they joined the program, Maine asked Connie for a private word. She wouldn't tell anyone what he said and he wouldn't tell either. Carolina on the other hand guessed EXACTLY what had happened. Carolina was disappointed that Maine liked Connie better than he liked her, but she WAS mad about Connie not telling her. What was she afraid of? That Carolina would spread it like the plague?

When Connie came into their room that night, she noticed Carolina looked different. She asked what was up, but Carolina just ignored her. Connie just shrugged and went to sleep, unaware of what Carolina had in store for her the next day.
141.title: Carolina

1411.content:
The next morning Connie woke up and Carolina was gone. She must have gotten a head start on training today. She thought.

Connie went to the mess hall and sat down next to North. "Have you seen Carolina?" she asked him. "No, I haven't. I was actually gonna go look for her, I need to ask her something." He replied. After they finished eating they started to search the ship for Carolina. They asked everyone they saw if they had seen her but none of them had.

"Man, I'm starting to get worried." Connie said as they walked out of the training room. "Me too." agreed North. "Where could she possibly have gone?" "I don't know. I'm gonna go back to my room and take a shower. I stink." Said Connie.

Five minutes later she arrived at her room. She was surprised to find someone already there...


Who is it?
1411.title: The next morning

14112.content: "Hey, Me and North have been looking for you all day. Were've you been?" asked Connie. "I've been looking for stuff for my project I've been working on for the past couple of hours." replied Carolina. "Actually, I need you for it. Do you have anything planned for tonight?" "Not that I can think of. Can I hop in the shower first though?" asked Connie "Yeah sure." answered Carolina. "Take your time...
14112.title: Carolina

141121.content:
Connie walked out of the bathroom to find Carolina watching TV. "Alright, I'm ready. Watchya need?" asked Connie. "Come here and lay on the bed." said Carolina.

Connie walks over to her bed and lies down. Carolina then takes her hands and ties each of them them to a top corner of the bed. She then ties each foot to a bottom corner of the bed. "So I've been wondering, what did you and Maine talk about yesterday?




Does Connie tell her?
141121.title: About ten minutes later

1411212.content:
"Alright then, suit yourself then." said Carolina. "By the way, you wouldn't happen to be TICKLISH would you?" "N-no, Please. Don't do that, ANYTHING but that!" begged Connie. "Too late. You wouldn't answer my question so you must pay the price." said Carolina, an evil grin spreading across her face. Carolina took her finger and slowly drags it down the arch of Connie's foot. Connie let out a small giggle. Carolina then started tickling Connie's right foot with all ten fingers. "AAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!!! PPLLEASE! DON'T! NO! STAHAHAHAHAPP!" screamed Connie who is in fits of laughter. "Don't stop? Is that what you said? Well okay then, if you say so." said Connie.
"So Connie, you gonna tell me what you two were talking about?" asked Carolina, still going full blast on Connie's feet. "NEVER! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!!!" laughs Connie. "Okay then were should I tickle next? Your entire naked body is exposed and ripe for tickling!"
1411212.title: No

14112121.content:
"Ooh! Your armpits look VERY tempting!" coos Carolina while Connie is still giggling. "I think that's where we will begin next!" She then starts dragging her fingers over Connie's defenseless armpits. "AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! PLEASE STAHAHAHAHAP! I'LL HAHAH TEHEHEHELL YOU! JUST PLEASE HAHAHAHAH STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHP!" yelled Connie while screaming with laughter.

"Okay then. Out with it." said Carolina
"Alright." said Connie catching her breath "Maine pulled me aside yesterday to ask me if I wanted to go out with him. Of course I said yes, but the reason I didn't tell you was because I thought you would hate me because of it. And I thought you were gonna spread it around."
"Connie, how long have we known each other now? Two years? And how many times have I told ANYONE ANY of your secrets? That's right: zero. I don't see why you didn't just tell me. I wouldn't hate you over something as stupid as THAT!" said Carolina.

So Carolina untied Connie and gave her clothes back.

Who will tickle her next?
14112121.title: Armpits

info.brief_description: Tickle the girls of the red vs blue project freelancer. Tickle them any way or anywhere!!!
info.description:
Characters: York, North, South, Carolina, Tex, Connie, Wash, Delta, Theta. Places: anywhere, use your imagination.
Rules:
1) No guy tickling
2) No sex
3) Use you imagination
4) HAVE FUN!!!!!!!
info.pretty_title: Red vs Blue: Freelancer Girl Tickling
